page.title: ℹ️ About re-frame
page.missionText: give people who struggle with avoidant patterns a gentle way to challenge harsh thoughts—without shame, ads, or data mining.

list.whatItIsText: a CBT-informed cognitive-restructuring tool that spots thinking traps (catastrophising, mind-reading, etc.) and offers kinder perspectives.
list.whatItIsntText: full psychotherapy, medical advice, or a crisis service.
list.whoBuildsText: just me—Carlos, a software engineer who's lived with AvPD for years and is investing my own time, skills, and will to create the tool I wish I'd had.
list.whyOpenSourceText: transparency builds trust; anyone can inspect or improve the code.
list.roadmapText: opt-in community peer support, progress journaling, therapist hand-off export.
